text:
eBay (mobile.de) | iOS & Android Engineers | Berlin, DE

https://jobs.ebayinc.com/job/berlin/ios-developer-f-m/403/51... https://jobs.ebayinc.com/job/berlin/android-developer-f-m/40...

I am hiring manager at mobile.de, the biggest car marketplace of Germany and subsidiary of eBay, and we are looking for iOS and Android developers.

Feel free to submit your application using the links above.
